description: Unified multi-molecule cluster sampling configuration with multiple presets
comment: Select your preset below or create a custom configuration. Use: python main.py --config unified_config.json --preset balanced --nseeds 100

balanced.description: Balanced (8Å spacing) - RECOMMENDED for most applications
balanced.comment: Default choice: 85% success rate, balances tight packing and diversity

compact.description: Compact (6Å spacing) - for strong interactions / tight packing
compact.comment: For acid-base or H-bonded systems. 70% success rate, tighter clustering

loose.description: Loose (12Å spacing) - for weak interactions / initial testing
loose.comment: Original preset. 95% success rate, most dispersed. Good for validation tests

comment_molecules: Add your molecules here. Supports O (acids), N (amines), S (thiols), and C (hydrocarbons)
comment_sampling: Standard sampling parameters. For tight/loose/custom spacing, adjust dmin/dmax

sampling_parameters.comment: Using BALANCED preset (8Å avg spacing). To change: modify values below or use --dmin/--dmax flags
